CHAT.comment: NEVADA COMMISSION ON ETHICS, Petitioner v. MICHAEL A. CARRIGAN
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:09 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN P. ELWOOD ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOSHUA E. ROSENKRANZ ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN P. ELWOOD ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:06 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
